column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: The Administrative Unity Command confiscated a car and arrested 6 Chinese nationals (3 males
column4: 3 females) who were traveling inside after weapons were found on the night of October 6
column5: 2020 in Sihanoukville.------Police identified the vehicle as a black Alphard with license plate Phnom Penh 2BE-0032. Inside were 6 Chinese nationals
column6: and a search of the car uncovered a GLOCK19 Gen5 pistol
column7: 30 rounds of ammunition and a package of drugs.------The suspects were detained by the police and brought for interrogation according to the procedures. ------KBN
